review:
Amazon is always known for its great delivery.. As expected received before
the expected delivery dat and as we all know Sony is known for its headphones
sound compare to other product but really disappointed with the Sony headphone
packaging.. It was in box and with and bag but no other packaging to keeo it
safe from outside impacts it can easily break in the box and when I received
the box was already got pressed by weight kept on it.. Even the packaging from
amazon was pathetic..

Just bought it on discount! Sound delivery is very sweet. Loudness is not too
high. Good bass boost system. Sound quality is clear with bit surround effect.
But if you expect dj concert like bass and orchestra type treable, then it
can't fulfill your requirement, then go for over 1200+ bucks range. It meets
my requirements. Previously I used various headphones of high and mid range. I
bought it for my gaming laptop. Its too comfortable for long usage and again I
repeat its too cool to be with sony!!!

I would have given 0 star but giving 1 star as I am very disappointed by
quality of Sony head phone MDR-ZX110A delivered by Amazon.Writing the review
after 1 year , left ear pad is gone no sound coming and right ear pad causing
migraine,very bad sound quality,no so called "sony" bass effects,ear cushions
are not comfortable at all.It's not worth to buy this product rather I would
suggest the buyer's to go for better models of sony even though they are
costly its worth the money to purchase those but not this item.  
  
Its my advice to Amazon not to employ cheap selling strategy and deliver low
quality in the name of Sony.Value your customers time and money.

Fast delivery. Comes in original sony packaging. very comfotable ear pads. but
not for prolonged used. Material quality is ok , not for rough use. Clear and
very good sound. Bass is average. I goy it for 600 excluding 60 cash back.
over all a nice product.

Sony has always produced great stuff. No wonder why they are always on top
when it comes to manufacturing any goods. Although the price may look high but
you will not bother when you start using the product. This fast charging cable
is another classic example of what Sony is all about. There is nothing that
can match Sony products and they have been consistent. I have used other stuff
similar to this but was never pleased with the results.  
  
Kudos to entire Sony team for making their products world class! I'm having a
great time using their products.. Sony TV, Home Theater, Smart Phone, Adapter,
Charger and now this Stereo Head Phones.

Sony headphones are top quality I've benn using them for 6 months now and the
sound is just perfect the colour is still bright i also found out they are
water resistant ( i wore them in heavy rain,they are still perfect), awesome
product an music lover must have

It is a nice headphone it is one the ear and cones without mic color is nice
shining but let's see after some time as I've recently bought them sound
quality is good but there is little noise leak when there is silence which
doesn't affect you and if you are listening audio in good quality then this
will give you best performance I bought them in 600 as some amazon offer was
going on if you are looking for budget headphone go fir this I've researched a
lot and got the best result amazon gave product on time only two day delivery
here in pune .

This just came like this today, it was in plastic pouch, was not even In the
Sony box. And there's not even warranty card or something. Sound is good
though,... And headphones looks new. (Not used). So I'm pretty happy. I got
these for 649, so let's see how much it works.

Superb sound and quick delivery good bass confontable to listen long time for
this range this is good ₹ 600 TQ Amazon I loved it

One of the best headset I've purchased. Good sound effects and quality wise no
bad comments though it was made in china as mentioned on the headset itself.
Some says it has inbuilt mic but I haven't seen any kind of it. And for phone
calls the other end person can easily get my voice clearly even without the
mic. Totally I'm happy with this headset.

review:
Within a year on speaker is not working. Right side. Don't know who is to be
contacted for warranty. I feel Amazon should make arrangements to take care of
products within warranty period.  
  
within warranty period one speaker failed and Amazon dont help to claim
warranty. About warranty dont trust Amazon buy at your own risk.

What I liked is the fold-able design. Sound quality is average but OK for
headphone in this range. These lasted around 6 months. After around 2 months
the gold plating on connectors faded away. After around 6 months the
connections on the headphone jack connections became loose and sounds became
intermittent and I had to open and see what went wrong. That is when I noticed
quality of build and material used inside.  
  
Opinion after use for 6+ months -  
1\. Average build quality  
2\. Not sure if it is original Sony. The quality of soldering and connectors
indicate cheap quality parts used and poor assembly quality which is not as
per Sony or any good branded product.  
3\. See pictures of connectors and original soldering on joints which is
substandard.  
  
OK if you get it in a sale around Rs 500 and if you can do minor repairs in
case it fails for you.

My god these are such good headphones, over the last three to four years maybe
I have been buying new in ear headphones and gaming mics but none of the ones
I bought for music lasted me, these have lasted since september and now its
december and I LUV DEES HEADPHOWNS SOW MUCH! They sound perfect, its a simple
design so the look suits most if not all people.  
Cheers sony!

I'm a sound Engineer of good experience so i would like to share a good
review.  
Value for money.  
Pros.  
Light weight.  
Sound quality is not bad. Lack of tight punch but does its job good.  
The Brand Sony.  
Gold plated 3.5mm jack.  
Tangle free cables.  
  
Cons.  
Not For long time listening.  
Ear cups are not so durable and will get dirty soon after a period of rough
usage.  
Sound quality is not that great. For sure a muddy Mid is a drawback.  
Not for BASS lovers definitely.  
Should handle with care without dropping it.  
  
Verdict.  
For this price point its a good buy, It should be a secondary headphones if
you are a music lover.  
But definitively not for audiophile. Watching youtube listening to soundcloud
this headphones are worth a try.  
NOTE : All this review is based on my testing.

1\. Very good sound by head phones  
2\. We can't see microphone in it but I think it is internally present because
when i calling to others by using this headphones they have heard my voice
almost clear  
3\. We can't almost not hear all surrounding noises while using it  
4\. It can be foldable see the pics carefully by which it can be packed in
luggage at less space  
5.when I have purchased the sony headphones it is only ₹.500 for this cost
this head phone is best  
I have purchased this product in 2017 but reviewing in 2018

The packing carton was like as that of an unbranded one maybe because of
importing in bulk at cheaper rates, the cartons are not shipped but the end
product is decent. Is working great. I have been using it since last 2 months.
The cable is thick enough to get is going for months without wire damage. If
you use it for 2-3 hours daily, it's still cozy and comfortable to wear. A
little bit of extra bass - it's a good thing (don't expect much in the base
side however).

i have purchased this headset on august & just one month this product not
working properly as i am not able to listen in right headset now i think i got
cheated by amazon as i have get duplicate product & service center also not
helping me to resolve this issue, very cheap quality & fake product provided
as now sony service centre refuse to provide service for this item which is
under warranty

Personally check it all my and friend mobiles in FullHD 1080p videos and high
end 320kbps songs...  
  
Pros:  
1.good sound  
2.clear bass and clear music deatails  
3.foldable design..  
4.ear cuff fits very well..  
5.light weight and adjustable..  
  
Cons:  
1.folding was little bit tricky..  
2.mic nil(no) (see in product details)  
3.this headset sound quality was different in various mobile models..  
  
i. High end mobiles give full effects and higher volume sound..great Bass and
surrounding effects  
  
ii. Middle end mobiles give good clarity and medium bass.. Some mobiles gives
low sound volume..  
  
iii. Low end some mobiles give mixed effects and low bass another low end
mobiles gives low sound volume  
  
Checking mobile list below..  
Xiomi redmi 2, xiomi Mi4, lyf flame 4, lyf wind 7, lyf water 1, lyf water 10,
micromax bolt, lenovo a6000 plus, lenovo k5 plus, samsung on5 pro, samsung on7
pro, samsung j7nxt, htc one E8, LG G4, xperia xa ultra, Xperia Z2, zopo ,
motorola g4

This headphone is truly efficient.I am a huge anime and Case Closed fan with a
keen interest in classical Hindi songs.My headphone excelled in all these
levels,thus overwhelming me cuz the earphones start at a price of over ₹800,I
bought this for ₹600.The only demerit is that it makes some kind of crunching
sound during use.  
Well,I would love to give 4 stars to it,at last.

At price 501 ...it's the best headphone. Bass is good .. comfortable on ear..
but sound intensity is little bit low at full volume using equaliser. but
that's not the big deal.. overall it's a great product at this price. Go for
it

These headphones are best in class....people complaining about it should know
that as its has high power driver so normal music player won't produce best
quality sound....use cracked version of jetaudio available on Google ( not in
play store) set DPS on in its setting and in DPS set headphone output to Sony
zx110.... Set am3d on....switch off mobile default equilizer....that's
it....you won't believe it's quality

Sound and build quality of this headphone is awesome. I have one of those costly headphone that ...
A Good product for first-time buyers!
review:
Arrived on time.  
I was very sceptical about these headphones first looking at the price. I got
the deal at 500₹.  
These really do deliver a good performance to price ratio. The bass is just
awesome. The treble notes are not very audible and can be adjusted with
equalizer. The cups don't flip but fold inside in a compact fashion which is
good.  
I'd suggest anyone who is looking for a budget headphones without mic. to go
with these.

No deep bass and its not acoustic. Could hear outside noise and delicately
designed. Should handle with care. Didnt expect just a bad quality headphone
from sony. Very much disappointed.

A really good headset considering the price range, the sound quality's pretty
good and they are comfy on the ears. I read some reviews of people complaining
about their ears hurting after a while but that only happens when you wear
them from the wrong side. There are markings on them saying 'R' and 'L'
indicating the correct sides and when you use them accordingly, there's no
pain. I use them for hours straight and have no problem at all.  
So if your budget is of less than 1000 bucks then definitely go for this
product :D

my first pair of headset for my tablet but the thing is that my tablet just
sucks in sound but when i connected it to my moms phone it just outshined
every headset i owned and the quality is good  
the bass is good (just great)  
the vocals are just average and the mids are just low  
if you listen to edms this is for you  
only for bass heads

Got it only for 550 bucks which is really an unbelievable cost for a brand
like sony. Sound quality is nice. Comfortable to wear. Overall loved the
product.

If can go for the Sennheiser HD 180, then do not buy this. This can never come
close to HD 180 but it is a very good headphone for its price. No wows. Just a
mediocre piece of sound equipment but the best at its price.

I did this foolishness by buying this for the third time, earlier two headsets
were already dead, as one of their speakers were dead.  
Even this one didn't last even 6 months. Right speaker was dead again,after
four months. Got it repaired by replacing the remaining speaker of the older
headset. Then the left speaker gone, and then the jack pin stopped working.
They are not selling the product, rather selling the name 'Sony'. I wud
suggest to go for new upcoming companies, on the basis of customer review
basis, since they are new, they maintain quality and price too to stay in the
competition and market. This is not the same 'SONY' it used to be ten years
back. Its all mediocre Chinese material. GO FOR IT AT YOUR OWN RISK.

I have received the faulty Head phone (Right side is not working), also the
box was already in seal opened condition. (hope they done this knowingly)  
Then returned & replaced later. So i gave only 1 star for supply the faulty
product with the seal opened box knowingly.  
  
Note: The replaced sony head phone is working great...!

Sound and build quality of this headphone is awesome. I have one of those
costly headphone that makes u feel the bass, this product is the same. It
makes u feel those hard basses and u can actually sense those crisps of the
music. But why 3 stars? They didn't sent dis product with the 1 year warranty
card which they promised before the purchase 3:( . But not gonna return it
though. I love this headphone.

To be honest, the sound quality is quite decent, not bass-heavy, as can be
expected in this segment (entry level)  
The build is good (Not for rough use)  
The cushions dont hurt your ear even after long use.  
BUT MOST IMPORTANTLY, this device is compatible with most devices, i.e.- my
laptop, mobile, digital piano, etc.  
  
The product packaging was also very good. It came in a hard box-in good
condition.

The wire gave up. The build quality of cable is not that good.  
Talking about the sound I would say sound I good at this price range.

This product does not sound that good and sounds as equal as 150 rupees
earphone sounds.using the headphone for an hour feels ear pain not internally

sony's name. Buying it was a wrong decision

Performance : The product is excellent. I used the product with an 100% input
volume from my Iphone and the speakers of the headphone performed excellently
even in the loud sound input. Their was no cracking of sound even in high bass
setting. It excellent value for money product. The 3.5 mm jack at the end of
the wire is in L shape which is an excellent product innovation, to increase
the life of the wire at the end as it will not bend and will not break with
long use.  
Looks : The product is pure white, which makes it look good. The inside
portion of the ear piece has leather covers on the speakers, which looks good
and if they last longer because of wear and tear then excellent. The speakers
at the end of the head band are also fold-able and can be folded to make them
horizontally parallel to the headband, so it is easy to store and carry while
travelling.  
I bought the product at Rs.499/- during a lighting deal, so its Paisa
Vasool......

Over all average product at this price  
Sound is gud

Quite satisfied with these headphones. Its been a year now and they work as
good as new. I am using it on my dell laptop. Excellent bass and mids as well.
Will recommend it. Just be careful with use as they are all plastic. But will
last long if handled carefully.

Bought this at half the price(Rs. 500) in sale for my Kid. Primary reason was
because it is not too loud hence safe for kids as you cannot track and control
them all the time. Folding design hence easy to carry or store. Wire length is
good enough though not too rugged and malfunctions(My friend reported) in some
cases.

Excellent headphone with clear sound. Feels premium and looks awesome.  
  
Totally worth the price of ₹600.  
  
Don't give a second thought, just grab it.

I got the white one..Ordered on 23 Rd Jan Tuesday.. Scheduled delivery time
was next Tuesday..But got it on Sunday...  
The product was neatly packed in a cardboard box... Inside was the product,
user manual and on the box was 1 year guarantee written..  
Got it in the lightning deal in just ₹550..  
Since 28th Jan (the receiving date) till today, 1st feb, have faced no problem
so far.. The sound quality is quite good...  
All in all, in such a cheap price, it is a great buy...

I got this headset during a sale for just ₹549. I would say, this is the best
you can get for even price upto ₹800. Noise cancellation is not as much as in-
ear headphones. The inner packaging (by Sony) was not at all appealing (see
the pictures)

The 'made in China' written on box bother me but the product is good
(according to the price), bass in not great but good, sound quality in nice,
comfortable and fits nicely. Earpads are not so good and looks cheap.  
Now the thing I don't like at all is the packaging it came in a cardboard box
with no bubble wrap just the headphone inside it, and the box was partially
crushed and damaged, fortunately the headphones are in working condition. The
packaging are like getting worse and worse with every purchase with Amazon.

These headphones are good in such a price range.......i bought them in Rs.501
and they are still working good after 2 months since purchase........the bass
is good.........but sound may feel low..........though i used to listen music
in low volume....i keep the volume at a level 5-6 while the full is i think
12.......at 5-6 it feels comfortable and good to me......so the headphone are
awesome!

Just bang for the buck... U will not get better headphones than this at this
price point. I have used other headphones like Phillips dj shl3000 & JBL
headphone of this price segment but I was most impressed with this.  
Bass is great, voice and treble are sometimes overshadowed by bass.  
So I will recommend to buy this if you are in tight budget and loves rock,
EDM, rap, metal songs. Otherwise I might be disappointed.  
Also the wires are long enough to be used conveniently.

Headphones are really comfortable and ur ears don't pain even if u listen
music 2-3 hours. My first impression was: very clear sound bt a low bass. Bt
after changing my device settings bass has improved significantly. Overall
excellent sound quality and good baas combo.  
\- if u are using redmi note 4, then u hve to change ur sound settings to
headphones or capsules.  
\- if u hve any other device then change ur sound setting from balance to bass
90% and surround sound to be 60% , then trust me u'll get sound and bass
better then 800rs JBL headphones.

Within 3 month both the speakers stop working, pl do not buy from this seller,  
Sony MDR-ZX110A On-Ear Stereo Headphones, I want it to return back...

Sound quality is very good. And such good looks are a huge plus too. My only
complaint (and a serious one too) is that the folding mechanism is not
practical. It has made the headphone much more prone to breakage. Once, the
left ear speaker popped out of the socket. I got scared but after coming back,
I was able to fix it back in place after I found the tiny needle in my bag.
The needle keeps the speakers in place and assists in the folding mechanism.
In short, it is more a hassle than a function. I'd rather have a simple non-
folding headphone that is more durable. Take good care, and it should be okay.
Not too me rough handled at all. 4 stars.

I have tried this headphones but not bought one for me. As from reviews I
thought it is not good for Bass. But after buying I can tell you its awesome!  
  
You get good Bass and audio quality. But being a Sony product, the packaging
was not quite premium. I bought it in a Flash Sale on Amazon and for that much
money I spent I got a Very Good Deal!!  
  
Go for it

I've bought this twice and it's always given great sound, and is comfortable
on the ears. However, it's rather warm, so suitable for cool weather or AC
rooms - it gets a little uncomfortable in hot weather.  
  
However, I would buy it again, as it's sound is great and the price very
decent for the quality.

Excellent choice.  
Great sound quality.  
Excellent BASS impact.  
Worth of the price.

Well my Sony MDR stopped working in like a month after a purchase and it was
not even used much. I used it like for a week in a month. But the only reason
I won't rate it too low since Sony and Amazon made my experience a lot less
worse after it malfunctioned. The left channel stopped working, contacted
Amazon, they provided me a copy of invoice ASAP and also assured me my model
was under 1yr warranty. Then Sony service centre at saltlake, Kolkata replaced
my headphones in about a week (though I fought a lil since they asked for the
original packaging box, which I didn't have). The new ones are working fine
now

The product looks expensive than it's cost. Build quality is excellent. The
plastic is sturdy. Earpads are the softest and most comfortable than compared
to it's rivals. Bass is great. All thanks to the 30 mm driver. It is better
than all the headphones that cost you around 2000/. Trust me. You'll not
repent. And once again Amazon nailed the overall delivery and buying
experience! A must buy.
